column4: it's not a big deal.. I'll probably end up downloading the coverage from torrents and not look at the olympic scores until I watch it..

unfortunately for me, the events I'm looking for are from 3AM-6AM local time... So it's not too feasible to try to watch live

anyone know of a tile horizontally, or tile vertically windows organizing app ?
i'm surprised ubuntu doesn't have that feature
if the torrent is a capture of a HD stream... then :)
